body: We have gathered here today to mourn the loss of mamaman1, a great person and a cornerstone of this community. But alas, after masturbating to a particularly stimulating KanColle Futa doujin, he had a brief lapse in judgement and commented "translate pls" in the comment section. After hearing of this, his friends and family quickly rushed to his rundown apartment... But they arrived too late. mamaman1 was already gone, a grim reminder of the dangers of hentai for all of us. I hope he lives on in a better place. So long, mamaman1, and Godspeed.
